The statement made by Luc Montagnier: a Nobel Prize-winning virologist, claiming that COVID-19 was artificially created in a lab by biologists working on an AIDS vaccine.
Expert opinions: such as virologist Etienne Simon-Lorière from the Pasteur Institute, disputing Montagnier's theory and calling it absurd.
The lack of credibility of the paper cit: as it was not published in a peer-reviewed journal and subsequently withdrawn by its authors.
